fulltext:
Dang Luu Thuy Quyen 
CAREER SUMMARY 
Experienced Supply & Demand Planning management with over 11 years of working in an 
international Pharmaceutical Company. Responsible for leading market in demand, supply, 
logistics, inventory and distribution management with demonstrated success in supply chain 
transformation, implementation of new planning tools and process. CIPS Diploma in 
Procurement and Supply, Chartered Institute of Procurement & Supply. Awarded “Best Function 
of the Year” in 2017, “Spot Award” in 2015, “Best Performance” in 2014. 
Key Competencies and Skills: 
• Supply & demand planning management 
• Logistics management 
• Forecasting & purchase ordering  
• Inventory management 
• Vendor & contract management 
• Budget control 
• Cross-functional and multinational team 
leadership 
• International trade 
• Quality Compliance 
• Merger and integration  
• System implementation 
• Troubleshooting 
• Project management 
• Pharmaceutical Regulatory, HR 
and financial knowledges  
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Supply Chain Manager:   
January 2013 - Present 
Rep. Office of Actavis Int. Ltd. i
HCMC
n
– belonging to TEVA Corporation. 
Served as very proactive member of management team to handle all logistics & supply chain 
operations: forecasting, purchasing, logistics, inventory and distribution for directed supply from 
15 manufacturing sites in 11 countries to Vietnam. Collaborate across the organization in 
implementation of the distribution network as well as supplier & distributor management. 
Duties: 
• 
Manage demand planning/ order, logistics & supply chain to bring products via global 
supply chain network to market on time as market demand and financial targets. 
• 
Handle market S&OP and tender management cross-functionally for accurate demand & 
supply forecast as well as inventory controls. 
• 
Foresee & develop solutions for all problems in logistics, supply, transportation & 
distribution. 
• 
Involve in tender process for choosing & setup new MNC distributor (joining tendering 
committee & warehouse audit). 
• 
Support regional quality team to handle complaint SOPs process in market. Coordinate 
cross-functional teams as well as distributors to ensure quality compliance implementation 
as global SOPs for all goods delivered to the market. 
Achievements: 
• 
Established a robust S&OP process in Vietnam and consolidation of our distribution 
network from eight local distributors into two, including running a tender process to select a 
new MNC distributor in 2018, which significantly impacted on improvement of company’s 
profitability in Vietnam. 
• 
Won Awards in 2014, 2015, 2017. 
Admin and Logistics Officer:   
    April 2010 – December 2012 
Representative Office of Actavis Int. Ltd. in HCMC – belonging to ACTAVIS Corporation. 
Served as key staff to handle all logistics & supply chain operations: forecasting, purchasing, 
logistics, inventory and distribution for directed supply from 11 manufacturing sites in nine 
countries to Vietnam. Functionally support regional functions to handle financial, HR & 
administrative tasks for the market. 
    November 2007 – March 2010 
Representative Office of Actavis China in HCMC – belonging to ACTAVIS Corporation. 
Served as the first staff of Representative Office of Actavis Group in Vietnam together with 
Country Manager to setup and run business operation in Vietnam. Manage all logistics, supply 
chain operations: forecasting, purchasing, logistics & distribution for directed supply from three 
manufacturing sites in three countries to Vietnam. Support regional functions to handle 
financial, HR, Regulatory & administrative tasks for the market. 
Duties: 
• 
Manage demand planning/order, logistics & supply chain to bring products via global supply 
chain network to market on time as market demand and business targets. 
• 
Coordinate cross-functional teams as well as distributors to ensure quality compliance 
implementation as global SOPs for all goods delivered to the market. 
• 
Foresee & develop solutions for all problems in logistics, supply, transportation & 
distribution. 
• 
Monitor data management to keep accurate and valid records of product, supplier & 
distributor details, contract, pricing and invoicing information. 
• 
Work closely with suppliers and distributors to improve operations and reduce cost. 
• 
Accurately calculate & control budget of total supply chain costs & support Country 
Manager to estimate other operation costs.  
• 
Handle financial tasks (expenses forecast/ payment & report), HR tasks (recruitment, 
payroll & labor contract & benefit arrangement), administrative tasks (all admin & ad-hoc 
tasks provided by the Country Manager). 
Achievements: 
• 
Handled and monitored transition process of closing of Representative Office of Actavis 
China Holding (Hong Kong nationality) and establishment of new Representative Office of 
Actavis International Ltd. (Malta nationality) within 6 months from September 2009 to March 
2010. 
• 
Promoted to higher position “Supply Chain Manager” at end 2012 effective from 1 Jan 
2013.  
• 
Effectively supported General Manager to establish and run first Representative office of 
Actavis China Holding in Vietnam market including office setup, employment registered at 
FOSCO as well as distribution network management with two first local distributors. 
Admin & HR officer, Odyssey Resources VN Ltd. (an Australian Accounting Services Co.),  
Jun 2007 - Oct 2007 
Project Admin, Hainal Konyi VN (a Singapore Construction Co.,) Nov 2006 - May 2007 
Receptionist & Admin Staff, Silkroad VN Co. Ltd. - A UK IT Co., Aug 2005 - Aug 2006 
Education Consultant, SET Co (Vietnamese Overseas Study Consulting Co.), Jan 2004 - Jul 
2005 
English Teacher, Tran Nhan Ton Elementary School, Sep 2003 - Dec 2003. 
ACADEMIC QUALIFICATIONS 
CIPS Diploma in Procurement and Supply 
Chartered Institute of Procurement & Supply 
Mar – December 2019 
2nd Bachelor's Degree in Language (English) 
University of Social Sciences & Humanities           
2004 - 2006 
Bachelor's Degree in Language (Russian) 
University of Pedagogy            
1998 - 2003 
PROFESSIONAL CERTIFICATION 
Management for Middle Manager  
PACE Institute and Management (PACE) 
2013 
International Trade (Import – Export) Management  
University of Economics 
2010 
Business Financial Analysis  
The Centre of Economics Development  
2009 
Human Resources Profession 
HR Consulting and Services (BCC)  
2008  
Secretary & Assistant to Director  
VN National University (Faculty of Economics)  
2007 
TRAINING: 
Effective Presentation Skills, Planning & Organization Skills, Customer Care Skills, Regulatory 
training for New Pharma Law, Psychology basic, SAP MDG, DSC/ INFOR,… 
REFERENCES 
Available upon request.
